task.title: Locations and call numbers
task.shortdesc: Locations and call numbers are derived from MARC holdings records (MFHDs).

row.entry: Do not repeat on related LinguisticObject or VisualItem.
Do not repeat on containing Set.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: LocationsAndCallNumbers sampleBibs: - 3 - 9447 fieldSpec: - mfhd852bhim trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: NONE

step.cmd: Prepare the Voyager location code lookup table, which contains mappings between location codes and their corresponding names.
For each 852 field that contains a subfield b, select the value of subfield b.
If field 852 does not contain a subfield b, skip the 852 field.

info.note: This instruction is temporary. At some point, other MFHD fields should also be processed.

step.cmd: Normalize the value of subfield b and test whether it is equal to withdrawn or suppressed.
If the value is equal to either withdrawn or suppressed, skip the 852 field.
If the normalized value of subfield b starts with yulint, there is no call number.

info.note: MFHDs with an 852b value of yulint or yulintx should be converted to DigitalObject carrier resources. See .

step.cmd: Select and save the value of subfield b.

substep.cmd: Match the value of subfield b against the location code lookup table and save the value of the location_name.
Surround the value of the location_name with square brackets.

step.cmd: Select and save the value of subfield h.

substep.cmd: If the value contains (lc), select the original substring before (lc) and trim whitespace.

step.cmd: Select and save the value of subfield i.

substep.cmd: If the value contains (lc), select the original substring before (lc) and trim whitespace.

step.cmd: Select and save the value of subfield m.
Join the values of subfields 852him with a whitespace character. This is the call_number.
Concatenate the call_number with the location_name.
